team.subtitle: Meet the visionaries behind E-me. A strategic duo that combines creativity, technology and data to transform extraordinary ideas.

0.name: Daniel Vengoechea
0.description: He is the mind behind the success of EME, Apex AI, Gettranscribe and Elevvate. He turns challenges into opportunities with strategy, data and AI. Co-founder of Apparta and international speaker, he drives brands with creativity and high-impact technology.

1.name: Marcela Hinestrosa
1.description: Believes in brands with purpose and strategies that feel. Accompanies companies that want to grow with meaning, building from within: clear vision, solid structure and experiences that truly connect.
